graphql_operation_files.content: query ProtocolMetrics($pageSize: Int! = 1000, $startDate: String!, $endDate: String!){treasuryArbitrum_protocolMetrics(first: $pageSize, orderBy: date, orderDirection: desc, where: {date_gte: $startDate,date_lt: $endDate}){id block currentAPY currentIndex date gOhmPrice gOhmTotalSupply nextDistributedOhm nextEpochRebase ohmPrice ohmTotalSupply sOhmCirculatingSupply timestamp totalValueLocked} treasuryEthereum_protocolMetrics(first: $pageSize, orderBy: date, orderDirection: desc, where: {date_gte: $startDate,date_lt: $endDate}){id block currentAPY currentIndex date gOhmPrice gOhmTotalSupply nextDistributedOhm nextEpochRebase ohmPrice ohmTotalSupply sOhmCirculatingSupply timestamp totalValueLocked} treasuryFantom_protocolMetrics(first: $pageSize, orderBy: date, orderDirection: desc, where: {date_gte: $startDate,date_lt: $endDate}){id block currentAPY currentIndex date gOhmPrice gOhmTotalSupply nextDistributedOhm nextEpochRebase ohmPrice ohmTotalSupply sOhmCirculatingSupply timestamp totalValueLocked} treasuryPolygon_protocolMetrics(first: $pageSize, orderBy: date, orderDirection: desc, where: {date_gte: $startDate,date_lt: $endDate}){id block currentAPY currentIndex date gOhmPrice gOhmTotalSupply nextDistributedOhm nextEpochRebase ohmPrice ohmTotalSupply sOhmCirculatingSupply timestamp totalValueLocked}}

query ProtocolMetricsLatest {treasuryArbitrum_protocolMetrics(orderBy: date, orderDirection: desc, first: 1){id block currentAPY currentIndex date gOhmPrice gOhmTotalSupply nextDistributedOhm nextEpochRebase ohmPrice ohmTotalSupply sOhmCirculatingSupply timestamp totalValueLocked} treasuryEthereum_protocolMetrics(orderBy: date, orderDirection: desc, first: 1){id block currentAPY currentIndex date gOhmPrice gOhmTotalSupply nextDistributedOhm nextEpochRebase ohmPrice ohmTotalSupply sOhmCirculatingSupply timestamp totalValueLocked} treasuryFantom_protocolMetrics(orderBy: date, orderDirection: desc, first: 1){id block currentAPY currentIndex date gOhmPrice gOhmTotalSupply nextDistributedOhm nextEpochRebase ohmPrice ohmTotalSupply sOhmCirculatingSupply timestamp totalValueLocked} treasuryPolygon_protocolMetrics(orderBy: date, orderDirection: desc, first: 1){id block currentAPY currentIndex date gOhmPrice gOhmTotalSupply nextDistributedOhm nextEpochRebase ohmPrice ohmTotalSupply sOhmCirculatingSupply timestamp totalValueLocked}}

query TokenRecords($pageSize: Int! = 1000, $startDate: String!, $endDate: String!){treasuryArbitrum_tokenRecords(first: $pageSize, orderBy: date, orderDirection: desc, where: {date_gte: $startDate,date_lt: $endDate}){id balance block blockchain category date isBluechip isLiquid multiplier rate source sourceAddress timestamp token tokenAddress value valueExcludingOhm} treasuryEthereum_tokenRecords(first: $pageSize, orderBy: date, orderDirection: desc, where: {date_gte: $startDate,date_lt: $endDate}){id balance block blockchain category date isBluechip isLiquid multiplier rate source sourceAddress timestamp token tokenAddress value valueExcludingOhm} treasuryFantom_tokenRecords(first: $pageSize, orderBy: date, orderDirection: desc, where: {date_gte: $startDate,date_lt: $endDate}){id balance block blockchain category date isBluechip isLiquid multiplier rate source sourceAddress timestamp token tokenAddress value valueExcludingOhm} treasuryPolygon_tokenRecords(first: $pageSize, orderBy: date, orderDirection: desc, where: {date_gte: $startDate,date_lt: $endDate}){id balance block blockchain category date isBluechip isLiquid multiplier rate source sourceAddress timestamp token tokenAddress value valueExcludingOhm}}

query TokenRecordsLatest {treasuryArbitrum_tokenRecords(orderBy: date, orderDirection: desc, first: 1){id balance block blockchain category date isBluechip isLiquid multiplier rate source sourceAddress timestamp token tokenAddress value valueExcludingOhm} treasuryEthereum_tokenRecords(orderBy: date, orderDirection: desc, first: 1){id balance block blockchain category date isBluechip isLiquid multiplier rate source sourceAddress timestamp token tokenAddress value valueExcludingOhm} treasuryFantom_tokenRecords(orderBy: date, orderDirection: desc, first: 1){id balance block blockchain category date isBluechip isLiquid multiplier rate source sourceAddress timestamp token tokenAddress value valueExcludingOhm} treasuryPolygon_tokenRecords(orderBy: date, orderDirection: desc, first: 1){id balance block blockchain category date isBluechip isLiquid multiplier rate source sourceAddress timestamp token tokenAddress value valueExcludingOhm}}

query TokenSupplies($pageSize: Int! = 1000, $startDate: String!, $endDate: String!){treasuryArbitrum_tokenSupplies(first: $pageSize, orderBy: date, orderDirection: desc, where: {date_gte: $startDate,date_lt: $endDate}){id balance block date pool poolAddress source sourceAddress supplyBalance timestamp token tokenAddress type} treasuryEthereum_tokenSupplies(first: $pageSize, orderBy: date, orderDirection: desc, where: {date_gte: $startDate,date_lt: $endDate}){id balance block date pool poolAddress source sourceAddress supplyBalance timestamp token tokenAddress type} treasuryFantom_tokenSupplies(first: $pageSize, orderBy: date, orderDirection: desc, where: {date_gte: $startDate,date_lt: $endDate}){id balance block date pool poolAddress source sourceAddress supplyBalance timestamp token tokenAddress type} treasuryPolygon_tokenSupplies(first: $pageSize, orderBy: date, orderDirection: desc, where: {date_gte: $startDate,date_lt: $endDate}){id balance block date pool poolAddress source sourceAddress supplyBalance timestamp token tokenAddress type}}

query TokenSuppliesLatest {treasuryArbitrum_tokenSupplies(orderBy: date, orderDirection: desc, first: 1){id balance block date pool poolAddress source sourceAddress supplyBalance timestamp token tokenAddress type} treasuryEthereum_tokenSupplies(orderBy: date, orderDirection: desc, first: 1){id balance block date pool poolAddress source sourceAddress supplyBalance timestamp token tokenAddress type} treasuryFantom_tokenSupplies(orderBy: date, orderDirection: desc, first: 1){id balance block date pool poolAddress source sourceAddress supplyBalance timestamp token tokenAddress type} treasuryPolygon_tokenSupplies(orderBy: date, orderDirection: desc, first: 1){id balance block date pool poolAddress source sourceAddress supplyBalance timestamp token tokenAddress type}}
